long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did anyone have to adapt to the iPhone? Even your children can use it without any training. Why do you have to spend countless hours learning how to update or create a website?

Using the Magic Widgets extension, everyone with Internet access can become a web developer without learning complex tools and technologies. You can create your own web pages or improve the ones you already have without need code, by simply dragging and dropping components created and configured on the Mission Control platform.

Everyone should have the right to put its creativity at the service of all humanity through the Internet.
